events.message: We have received the candidate’s application for the software engineer role and the resume looks promising.
The application has been categorized under engineering as the candidate has extensive developer and software experience.
A recruiter experienced with engineering profiles has been assigned to handle this candidate’s process moving forward.
Initial phone screening completed; candidate demonstrated strong understanding of DevOps practices and software development lifecycle.
Candidate responded promptly with additional information about previous projects and confirmed availability for technical interview.
Technical interview has been scheduled for next Wednesday; candidate is prepared to demonstrate coding and problem-solving skills.
